title: Let's Watch TV: Everybody Loves Raymond
description:
This week starts the Holiday show marathon and we get ready for Thanksgiving with one of Fran's favorite TV show episodes of all time: Everybody Love Raymond S. 7 Ep.10. Joe discovers a character who reminds him of Mama Fran, and Fran recalls a holiday fiasco for the ages.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
